description: Numbers n such that n divides the (right) concatenation of all numbers <= n written in base 22 (most significant digit on right).
comments: This sequence differs from A061951 in that all least significant zeros are kept during concatenation.The next term is > 1460000. - Larry Reeves, Jan 16 2002
links: Lars Blomberg, Table of n, a(n) for a(n) < 10^7
